titleStmt.title: By the Committee of Safety. A proclamation Forasmuch as this Committee hath received certain information of several designs and endeavours of persons ill-affected to the publique peace and good of this Common-wealth, ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Committee of Safety.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills and John Field, Printers to the Committee of Safety,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Dated at end: Given at the Committee of Safety at Whitehall, the first day of December, 1659.
Prohibits "the contrivance or subscription of any petitions or papers for the promoting of designs dangerous to the peace of the Commonwealth."
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
